title: 突發  紐約多個機場暫停升降

replies.msg:
Coronavirus cases cause ground stop at New York City-area airports, FAA says
PUBLISHED SAT, MAR 21 2020 2:14 PM EDT

Air traffic into major New York City-area airports was halted on Saturday, the Federal Aviation Administration said, as coronavirus continues to cause staffing issues at FAA facilities around the country.
